enable_sticky.label: Announcement bar pinned at the top

pc_scroll_interval.info: Effective when display mode is set to automatic scrolling

show_social_media.info: You can add your social media links in 'Theme settings' > 'Social media'. Social media links won't be displayed if the announcement bar is set to 'Compact layout', 'Tiled display', or 'Automatically scroll left and right'.

collection_title_position.label: Text position on PC

enable_mobile_slider.label: Turn on left-right scroll to View all

slice_in_mobile.label: Turn on left-right scroll to View all

image.label: Image on desktop

image_mobile.label: Image on mobile
image_mobile.info: Recommended size: 720 x 1500 px for full screen, 720 x 760 px for 50% layout, 720 x 1000 px for 70% layout

button_text.label: Button text
button_text.info: If there's no button text, click the image to redirect

text_enabled_custom_font.label: Turn on special fonts for titles

group_header__2.label: Social media
group_header__2.info: Add relevant social media links in ['Theme settings' > 'Social media'](/editor?locator=settings&category=media_social)

show_country_selector.label: Display country/region selection
show_country_selector.info: Add at least two markets for this to take effect. To add a country/region, go to [Market settings](/admin/settings/markets)

show_locale_selector.label: Display Language selector
show_locale_selector.info: You need to go to 'Market' > 'Language management' and add at least two languages for the selector to take effect. To add a language, go to ['Language settings'](/admin/settings/lang), and after adding is complete, go to ['Market'](/admin/settings/markets) > 'Language management' and add the language of the current market.

group_header__0.label: Social media
group_header__0.info: Add relevant social media links in ['Theme settings' > 'Social media'](/editor?locator=settings&category=media_social)

image_full_width.label: Display full screen image at the bottom

show_country_selector.label: Display country/region selection
show_country_selector.info: Add at least two markets for this to take effect. To add a country/region, go to [Market settings](/admin/settings/markets)

show_locale_selector.label: Display Language selector
show_locale_selector.info: You need to go to 'Market' > 'Language management' and add at least two languages for the selector to take effect. To add a language, go to ['Language settings'](/admin/settings/lang), and after adding is complete, go to ['Market'](/admin/settings/markets) > 'Language management' and add the language of the current market.

transparent_image.label: Transparent header logo
transparent_image.info: To achieve the best visual presentation, turn on the transparent header and upload an image in [Theme > LOGO](/editor?locator=settings&category=logo)
